Class EditorMarker

java.lang.Object
  GameObject
      EditorMarker

public class EditorMarker
extends GameObject

The EditorMarker is used by the StateEditor for navigation and selecting tiles on the map EditorMarker is NOT tracked inside the Map EditorMarker is a subclass of GameObject

Author:
Ramsey Kant

                    Map m,
                    int x,
                    int y)
Class constructor for EditorMarker

Parameters:
color - Color of the marker
m - Reference to the map object
x - X coordinate to initially place the marker
y - Y coordinate to initially place the marker
Method Detail

changeTile

public void changeTile(int dx,
                       int dy)
Change tile is the EditorMarker's version of Actor's move() method. Called by keyPressed in StateEditor Moves the Marker on the screen

Parameters:
dx - Amount to change the current X coordinate by
dy - Amount to change the current Y coordinate by
See Also:
StateEditor.keyPressed(KeyEvent)

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
EditorMarker appears as a circle around the tile being edited. The color is set in the constructor

Specified by:
paint in class GameObject
Parameters:
g - The graphics context
See Also:
GameObject.paint(Graphics2D)
